channel.title: Webclient error
channel.description:
hello i was trying to make a webclient and i made the page and added this html thingymerbob - Webclient=] Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ - and it worked (mostly) except when i clicked login it said error connecting to server... i have ip thingy at 127.0.0.1 and everything HELP ME!

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Just saying this belongs in client help. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html

However, the problem is not to do with the webclient. You set that up right if it downloads the cache and loads the client fine. Maybe you didn’t port forward correctly or you didn’t compile the client to the correct IP.

Read full topic
